message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer and we can both move on.
I'm willing to be generous, Alice, but that first offer was way off. Let's split it more fairly this time.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a good deal for both of us. Don't get greedy.
Alice, this is my final offer.  It's more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation. Take it or leave it.
